titles.title: A resolution to express support for President Corazon Aquino and the Government of the Philippines.

action.text: Measure laid before Senate by unanimous consent.

vote.text: Submitted in the Senate, considered, and agreed to without amendment and with a preamble by Yea-Nay Vote. 73-0. Record Vote No: 241.

bill.summary: 9/11/1987--Introduced. Declares that the Senate: (1) congratulates the people and the loyal military of the Philippines for their success in ending the attempted overthrow of the Government; (2) renews its support for the efforts of President Corazon Aquino to pursue the development of democratic institutions; (3) supports military assistance to the Philippine Government to assist in defeating the Communist insurgency; (4) supports continued economic assistance to the Philippine Government; (5) calls attention to current U.S. law which requires suspension of U.S. military or other assistance if an elected head of the Philippine Government is deposed by military coup or decree; and (6) urges the Philippine Government to increase its efforts to address the problems of corruption within the Government.
